titles.title: Urgent Supplemental Appropriations Act, 1993
Making urgent supplemental appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1993, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Appropriations.

bill.summary: 5/4/1993--Introduced. Urgent Supplemental Appropriations Act, 1993 - Makes urgent supplemental appropriations for FY 1993 for: (1) judicial defender services and fees of jurors and commissioners; and (2) the business loans program account of the Small Business Administration.
